description: Tool to change the file type of an image file or copy it to a new file.

filetype.title: File type
filetype.description: The type of the file to convert to. Valid values include: ANALYZE, ANALYZE_GZ, NIFTI, NIFTI_GZ, NIFTI_PAIR, NIFTI_PAIR_GZ, NIFTI2, NIFTI2_GZ, NIFTI2_PAIR, NIFTI2_PAIR_GZ.

filename.title: Input file
filename.description: The name of the input image file.

filename2.title: Output file
filename2.description: The name of the output image file (optional).
